Games History

In 1986 an Australian, Dr Maureen Johnston, conceived and developed the concept of the Corporate Games and in 1988 the first World Corporate Games was held in San Francisco.

The license to stage Corporate Games in Australia was acquired in 1991 with the first Australian Corporate Games held in Sydney in 1993.

Australian Corporate Games 1993–2002

SYDNEY
